title: 112_hr2773
content: Establishment of units of the National Guard in the Commonwealth of the Northern Mariana Islands. Title 32 (National Guard) Amendments include changes to definitions, branches, organizations, and units in Puerto Rico and the Commonwealth of the Northern Mariana Islands. Amendments to Title 32 (National Guard) include changes to definitions, branches, organizations, and units in Puerto Rico and the Commonwealth of the Northern Mariana Islands. This involves updating various sections to include both Puerto Rico and the Commonwealth of the Northern Mariana Islands in the language used. Amendments to Title 32 (National Guard) involve updating sections to include both Puerto Rico and the Commonwealth of the Northern Mariana Islands in various provisions such as enlistment oath, adjutants general, detail of regular members, termination of appointment, and relief from national guard duty. Amendments to Title 32 (National Guard) include updating sections to include both Puerto Rico and the Commonwealth of the Northern Mariana Islands in various provisions related to courts-martial, convening authority, and governor's authority. Amendments to Title 32 (National Guard) include adding the Commonwealth of the Northern Mariana Islands to various provisions related to training, support operations, field exercises, national guard schools, and attendance at army and air force schools. Amendments to Title 32 (National Guard) include adding the Commonwealth of the Northern Mariana Islands to various provisions related to training, support operations, field exercises, national guard schools, attendance at army and air force schools, and accountability. Amendments to Title 32 include adding the Commonwealth of the Northern Mariana Islands to various provisions related to accountability, property officers, technicians, and property issued to the national guard. Amendments to Title 32 include adding the Commonwealth of the Northern Mariana Islands to various provisions related to accountability, property officers, technicians, and property issued to the national guard. Additionally, amendments to Title 10 involve updating definitions to include the Commonwealth of the Northern Mariana Islands in relevant sections. Amendments to Title 32 and Title 10 include adding the Commonwealth of the Northern Mariana Islands to various provisions related to national guard duties and exemptions. Amendments to Title 32 and Title 10 include adding the Commonwealth of the Northern Mariana Islands to various provisions related to national guard duties and exemptions, such as allowing air national guard members to serve as students, observers, and investigators at educational institutions, industrial plants, and hospitals. Amendments to Title 32 and Title 10 include adding the Commonwealth of the Northern Mariana Islands to various provisions related to national guard duties and exemptions, such as allowing air national guard members to serve as students, observers, and investigators at educational institutions, industrial plants, and hospitals. Commissioned officers' original appointments, organizing reserve components, standards for officers, and facilities for reserve components are also updated to include the Commonwealth of the Northern Mariana Islands. Facilities for reserve components in Title 32 and Title 10 are amended to include the Commonwealth of the Northern Mariana Islands. Definitions in Title 37 are also updated to reflect this change.
